question.title: How to change parameter names in spring boot before controller
question.body:
How to change parameter names in Spring boot before controllers? I want to change name of parameters in HttpServletRequest in Spring boot...

for example, I want to change these parameters

search[value]=test
search[regex]=false

to these parameters:

search.value=test
search.regex=false

and use @ModelAttribute in my controller for example:

@GetMapping
public ResponseEntity<?> search(
    @ModelAttribute Search search
    HttpServletRequest request, 
    HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception {
//    enter code here
}

Is it possible in Spring or Spring boot?

My Search model is

public static class Search {
    private String value;
    private boolean regex;

    // ... getters and setters (optional)
}

thanks
